title: What do i do with excess Championship Jewels? Also don't have a team icon. Help?
body: So I have about 24 extra Championship Jewels, and I already have the golden icon. In the future is there going to be something i can do with these? Also I'm pretty upset that the day I got ip, you guys removed the icons, so i have a golden icon but with no team icon. I didn't know that i had to have a team icon in order to flash the thing in game. FeelsBadMan. Would love any supportive feedback.

replies.body: Lew's information here is pretty solid.  Any excess jewels you have can be used for additional team icons if you like.  I have no information on additional uses for the jewels or if anything will be done with them beyond our [Worlds 2016](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-) guide.  Any updates on that may be posted on our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page.  Use them if you can!
but all the team icons are removed
so im stuck with the golden 1 ip thingy...
They're all showing for me!  In the store, go to the Accessories section then the Summoner Icons button on the left side.  They are 250 RP each and all there for the taking!
No way! I'm so dumb... Thank you so much!!!

Full jewel calendar and more explanation here:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-

The jewels are only for upgrading worlds icons and won't be used for anything else.  The ip token with 2 jewels are only available during broadcast days of worlds so they will be back later this week.
